reviews.text:
Has one of the best meals in my time in New York here. Delicious food that use classic flavours and seasonal ingredients. Short menu with a good delesection.

We got the scampi, the vegetable lasagna and the broccolini, and they served us two complimentary portions of foccasia. The scampi was abundant, the lasagna had robust and the broccolini was bright. All three dishes were perfectly cooked and had amazing depth of flavour without being too rich and heavy, with no cream used. The broccolini was bright and acidic with sweet, caramelised onions and garlic.

Loved it and cannot wait to eat here again. The place was casual and we sat outside. The service was quick, accommodating and polite.
Bolognese was decent but a little dry. Took almost an hour to get our food.
If youâ€™re looking for quick homemade pasta that doesnâ€™t leave you feeling like a bowling ball, this is the place! I tried the gnocchi and it was amazing :)
Me encantÃ³ el lugar, la atenciÃ³n y la comida muy recomendado

Great!!!
Fresh pasta, self service. we had the Forma house salad, puttanesca, Scampi, Penne in vodka sauce. excellent experience. would go back.
Treat this place as an upscale looking fast food. During busy times except to wait 30+ minutes for a food that is good but nothing to write home. For off peak hours, it is ok to good.
Food made with perfection spectacular.
The mushroom pasta and shrimp and salmon sides are delicious must-tries!
ë°œìš°ê³µì–‘ ë³´ì´ì‹œì£ ?

I have eaten here many times as you can tell by the amount of pictures I have of the pasta. Itâ€™s my favorite pasta place in the city and itâ€™s so affordable too! My favorite is the gemelli pesto and the spicy rigatoni, also! The scampi is DIVINE. This place has my heart, ever since I found it on tik tok and a plate was just $12.

Gluten free people. By far best gluten free pasta Iâ€™ve had in my entire gluten free journey. They make their own pasta in house. The service is simple where the customer is self efficient and works with ease. The outside patio area was cute and charming. Did I mention how good the pasta was? Iâ€™ll have to revisit whenever Iâ€™m in the area.. because it was so tasty, quick and just a perfect amount. No gross feeling of being full. A+ +

Love! Two plates for under $40. Amazing!

The staff is super friendly.

This seating arrangement is the silliest format Iâ€™ve encountered

Crowded hostile and pushy. Donâ€™t like it and absolutely unpleasant

I changed my rating from 1 to 2 because I gave critical feedback and the server was so pleasant and sweet. But my god, this was one of the most miserable dining experiences Iâ€™ve had primarily because of the format they chose to server food.

They do not serve food unless you get a seat and itâ€™s a battle to get a seat and everyone is SO hostile and combative.

I donâ€™t really care how good the food is. Dining here is miserable. 2 for how sweet the servers are but this format is miserable and combative

Fabulous pasta and dishes! We love the bagna cauda, their specials and all kinds of pasta there.

Die besten Pasta die ich seit lÃ¤ngerem gegessen habe. Der Service und das Ambiente waren auch super.
Sollten wir New York nochmal besuchen werden wir hier jedenfalls wieder vorbeischauen.
Man sollte etwas Wartezeit einplanen, da dieses Restaurant gut besucht ist.
Best pasta in town and best price for someone who always enjoyed cleaning after themselves like me ğŸ˜‹
Gemelli pesto was ok not that special, but popeyes ragi was really amazing!!!
Best pasta experience in Brooklyn.
Absolutely love all their pastas and the free focaccia!

Super adresse!!! Un accueil au top trÃ¨s sympathique, des entrÃ©es sympas, une focaccia offerte gratuitement lÃ©gÃ¨re et dÃ©licieuse, un choix de pÃ¢tes fraÃ®ches absolument excellentes! Le verre de vin blanc Italien super bon, dessert parfait. Le tout avec des prix vraiment corrects, c'est si rare... Un sans faute, bravo je me suis rÃ©galÃ©e!!
Amazing pasta at an incredible price! Value for money is truly amazing. Would def be coming back
went here everyday for a week at one point. Food is quality and reasonably priced. Cut back because eating that much pasta isnâ€™t a good strategy

I was really looking forward to dining here and trying the pasta, but unfortunately, I ended up getting severe food poisoning after eating the spaghetti bolognese with lamb meatballs. The dish looked well presented and I noticed it was quite rich.

Shortly after eating, I became violently ill and remained sick throughout the night. Iâ€™ve never had such a strong or prolonged reaction to food before, which leads me to believe there may have been an issue with how the meat was prepared or handled in the kitchen.

Itâ€™s incredibly disappointing, especially given how excited I was to try this place. I hope they take this seriously and investigate their food safety procedures.

Not sure what happened but I got really bad food poisoning after grabbing takeout here. Other than that, the pasta is delicious and affordable, and it looked like a cute spot to have a casual date at.

Forma Pasta Factory
Rating: 8.5/10
Date Last Visited: 9/5/2025

We ordered the Pappardelle Bolognese ($14) and Orecchiette ($17), which was the Friday special. Iâ€™ve also come in the past and ordered the Pipette Ragu ($14) and Fettuccine Funghi ($14). All the pasta I tried were cooked well, had amazing toppings, and delicious. My favorite was the ragu, but the fettuccine and bolognese are close seconds. The Friday special was good too, but was not as flavorful. Overall, I would recommend this restaurant if youâ€™re looking for good quality and tasting pasta for a solid price.

It's definitely one of my favorite pasta places. The portions are perfect, the pasta is fresh, and I never know what to eat because I have to try everything. The focaccia was delicious, and I love the meatballs. A nice place to share with friends.
dine almost once a week, same consistency in all their dishes! friendly staff.
Pastas were ok but salads were average flavor. Sunday meat lasagna is good just a bit salty.
Food was delicious and the lunch special was very reasonably priced. Would def recommend
Food is great , waiter is friendly . I wish the trashcan  was not next to the table. Thatâ€™s the only suggestions. I think can smell the trash while eating pasta

This is definitely a hidden gem of a restaurant. Friendly staff, delicious food, reasonable pricesâ€”I would recommend it to my friends and will definitely come back. My favorite dish is the shrimp pasta.
Such a YUMMY gluten free pasta option which is so rare to find
Ate here a couple of times, could say it tastes great almost authentic!
Good budget friendly pasta place
Great warm environment. Will be back.
Amazing alll around place to eat.
Amazing food, very fresh and tasty. Great locations and absolutely the best staff.
the best pasta I ever had. My go to spot in Williamsburg every time. The prices are great and so are the portions

Perfect Italian pasta. One of the best in NY. Everything from simple spaghetti pomadoro to ravioli is excellent. Good wine selection. Simple and tasty trattoria as it has to be

After class, my friends and I were hungry and wanted to eat at some restaurant nearby. We heard that Forma Pasta Factory has homemade pasta, so we decided to go. We ordered at the boot and paid up front, they will bring food to the table.

Fettuccine Funghi; sautÃ©ed wild mushrooms, rosemary & thyme cream sauce, parmigiano reggiano, I love this dish the most.

Spaghetti Pomodoro; san marzano tomatoes, basil, and parmigiano reggiano, regular

Thursday Special Chitarra; â€˜frutti di mare,â€™ shrimp, squid, mussels, calabrian chili, spicy white wine broth, it is good seafood dish.

We shared all dishes so I got to try all of that. The vibe is very casual and easy going.

Delicious as always. Cozy and informal. Soo delicious. A bit of a battle to find seating, but it's worth it :)

Very limited seating. But the staff was above and beyond. I couldn't find a table so I sat outside. One of the waiters grabbed my number and got me a table inside and made sure No one took it. Brought me bread and checked on me multiple times. I love this place

Affordable and good quality pasta in BK! Expect less than $20 per person and complimentary focaccia to pair. I got the $19 combo with red wine. Fast service, intimate, cheerful atmosphere too. Happily recommend!

Delicious, freshly made pasta right in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. The fettuccine is a must try - rich, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. Seating can take 20â€“25 minutes, but trust me, itâ€™s absolutely worth the wait.

Today, I have a pickleball match with my friends. I'm feeling hungry and need some energy, so I ordered Mafaldine scampi to eat in my car. It's so delicious that I want to order another box! If you like softer pasta, just ask for it to be extra cooked, and you won't be disappointed. The staff are friendly, and the atmosphere is nice. I will definitely come back soon!

DO NOT HESITATE TO EAT HERE. One of the best dining experiences ive ever had in New York. Absolutely incredible how their pasta is the price that it is. It's fresh handmade pasta and you can see them making it in the front. The texture is absolutely perfect, tastes so good.
This place blew my mind.
The bread that comes with the soup is so damn good it's one of the best breads that i've had in my life. Imagine if milk bread was Italian... so plush and scrumptious.
For a small place, the ambiance is soo nice. So much natural light in a tucked away seating area in the back. Clean as can be.
Service makes this place though. Shout out the owner who must keep their employees very happy because the energy in this place set the tone for my day. I was like sad to leave because I was having so much fun and felt so much joy eating there and being taken care of in a genuine way.
Forgot to snag a pic but their tirimisu is also made in house and is impeccable. Not too much alcohol flavour if any at all, perfectly whipped marscapone and evenly soaked ladyfingers.

Forma i love youğŸ˜‚ğŸ«°ğŸ¥¹

We found our favorite pasta place in Brooklyn! Not only itâ€™s the best deal in town but it also has the best quality and taste.
Fresh pasta dish is $14 and and you can add gem salad or kale Caesar salad for $3 (even on Saturday)
Staff were friendly and efficient. Line moves pretty quick.
My husband (heâ€™s a chef) said it was one of the best Pappardelle Bolognese he ever had. Pasta was cooked perfect and so flavorful.
This place knows what they are doing!
Salad was soooo good!
Canâ€™t wait to come back to try other pastas and desserts!

Excelente lugar para cena casual o cita. La pasta de diente fresca y de buena calidad. Algunas salsas me agradaron mÃ¡s que otras pero muy buena comida. Tienen paquete de â€œcomboâ€ que incluye una copa de vino de tu elecciÃ³n y la pasta y me pareciÃ³ un buen concepto a buen precio. Las mesas las agarras conforme llegas por lo que a veces es difÃ­cil conseguir lugar.

If youâ€™d like to enjoy a real Italian pasta without taking a mortgage this is the place for you.
Home made pasta that is made in the restaurant every day , clean and neat place nice decor and efficient stuff are what make this place very popular among local people.
Check it out you wonâ€™t regret.

Absolute best arancini Iâ€™ve ever tasted! Their sauces are rich and deep and so flavorful.  Gluten free spaghetti was perfectly cooked. Gem salad was tangy, crunchy and refreshing. Artfully crafted.

The servers are very warm and personable. You can tell they really care about their work.

Itâ€™s a bit small inside in terms of seating but the food more than makes up for it.  Wish I lived closer!

This hybrid restaurant is self service like fast food style ordering, first come first serve seating arrangement. , Cozy and I mean very close seating  gem in greenpoint Brooklyn was a cute delightful date with my nephew and I.

When we arrived it was packed without indoor seating, so we originally sat outside. Which we were indifferent about. Indoor seating cleared up so we sat inside.

The meatballs amazing, the cauliflower great vegan dish,   I also ordered gluten-free pasta just to try since they make fresh pasta. It was fairly decent i would have preferred my pasta to be cooked a little longer. Nephew seemed to enjoy his dishes

The staff was attentive I loved that. They have 2 locations in Brooklyn yes I would return and I recommend you trying it. The neighborhood is lively and friendly.  Oh did i mention its extremely affordable.
